title: Unable to set the Transfer-Encoding header using the SetHeader method on the http ResponseWriter
body:
by **raskchanky**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.  Write a handleFunc for the http package
2.  Call SetHeader("Transfer-Encoding", "chunked") on the
ResponseWriter argument to your handleFunc
3.  Start the server, hit the appropriate url, and notice that the Transfer-Encoding
remains unchanged.

What is the expected output?
Transfer-Encoding should be "chunked", or whatever you set it to using
SetHeader()

What do you see instead?
Transfer-Encoding:  Identity

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
OS X 10.6.4

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
f7e692dc29b0 tip
